name: Clownfall
description:
This game was made for Jamingtons 7.

You play as a clown trying to reach a platform in the other side of the circus. If the clown turns too much to one side, he falls.

Font used: https://www.dafont.com/circus.font

Music and sound effects:

https://freesound.org/people/robcro6010/sounds/342153/
https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/sounds/270528/
https://freesound.org/people/wolderado/sounds/415096/
